attributes.additional_details:
Allow people to give blood after a set period. Since 1980 anybody who has received a blood transfusion is not allowed to give blood.
I had a blood transfusion in 2000, due to an industrial accident. I have had blood tests and nothing has been find untoward.
So the government should allow people after a set period give blood, and allow them people if they want to give something back to the NHS.

rejection.details: Please see: Allow people who have received blood transfusions to donate
